title: MegaFood Men's 40+ One Daily Multivitamin | The Healthy Place
description: MegaFood® Men Over 40 One Daily is a whole-foods multivitamin supplement that supports overall health and vitality for men.
cleaned_text: Full Price 1 in stock 90 tablets Maintain your active, fit lifestyle! MegaFood Men's 40+ One Daily Multivitamin is a convenient, support supplement made just for men! - Whole-food multivitamin and mineral support for men age 40-55 - Supports overall health and wellbeing - Boosts heart, bone, brain, and nervous system health* - Supports prostate health* - Convenient once-daily tablet can be taken on an empty stomach - Iron-free formula - Tested for 125+ pesticides and herbicides MegaFood Men's 40+ One Daily Multivitamin When it comes to supporting men's specific health needs, this healthy multivitamin has got your back — literally! It's high in bone-enriching vitamins that enhance your strength and performance while benefiting many other areas of health as well. MegaFood Men's 40+ One Daily Multivitamin is a nourishing full-body support supplement that boosts overall health and wellness through whole-food ingredients from soil-rich sources. A blend of organic orange, broccoli, and carrot, along with a nourishing selection of herbs, make this daily support supplement for men stand out above most options available. MegaFood Men's 40+ One Daily Multivitamin array of whole foods and phytonutrients include vitamin C, vitamin B12 and folate, vitamin D3, vitamin K, and essential minerals such as zinc. Its Nourishing Food & Herb Blend offers additional benefits: - Immune-boosting: A blend of adaptogenic herbs, including eleuthero root, ashwagandha, and astragalus, help boost immunity and fight off stress. Eleuthero promotes heart health, boosts memory and cognitive function, and increases energy.* Ashwagandha helps improve mood and testosterone production.* Astragalus root reduces fatigue and helps protect from immune system threats or cold-weather concerns.* - Inflammation-busting: Antioxidant-dense hawthorn fruit, turmeric, ginger, and shiitake mushroom offer natural inflammatory benefits that support the heart and overall health. They help reduce blood sugar levels, regulate blood pressure, reduce triglycerides, and support healthy weight management.* - Prostate-supporting: Prostate-protecting herbs and nutrients such as nettle leaf are added to this men's multivitamin to support healthy prostate health. Ginkgo leaf provides natural circulation-boosting effects that benefit the heart and sexual function while Schisandra berry improves healthy libido, ejaculation, and semen production.* Encourage a young and fit body and mind with MegaFood Men's 40+ One Daily Multivitamin! Its high-quality organic herbs rooted in ancient medicine are a great ally to the immune system and help slow signs of aging too! Suggested Use: Adults take 1 tablet daily with a beverage. May be taken any time of day, even on an empty stomach. Cautions: Keep out of the reach of children. Biotin may interfere with lab tests. Consult a physician before taking this product if you are taking medication, planning to undergo lab testing, pregnant, nursing, or have a medical condition. Questions? We've got answers! Click the LiveChat button in the lower right hand side of your screen to start talking with one of our Wellness Consultants or [ call one of our stores](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/contact/) to speak with a member of our team. Serving Size: 1 Tablet Servings Per Container: 90 Ingredients: Vitamin A (as beta carotene), Vitamin C (as ascorbic acid), Vitamin D3 (as fermented cholecalciferol), Vitamin E (as d-alpha tocopherol from seed Vitamin K glycinate), Food & Herb Blend [Organic brown rice, organic orange, carrot, organic ashwagandha root, organic eleuthero root, organic astragalus root, hawthorne fruit, organic broccoli, organic schisandra fruit, organic nettle leaf, organic organic oregano blueberry, cabbage, organic shiitake mushroom mycelium] Other Ingredients: Ferment media (organic brown rice, rice protein, autolyzed yeast extract, yeast [inactive]), silicon dioxide, stearic acid, rice protein, autolyzed yeast extract, tapioca food starch, hypromellose MegaFood uses a four-step approach to making real food supplements. This is what sets them apart as a brand that you can trust and love. - REAL FOOD FROM FARMERS: Finding the best organic and sustainable farms growing the best whole foods is crucial to creating real good-for-you supplements. - TESTING! TESTING! TESTING!: MegaFood® ingredients are tested three times throughout processing. They strive to ensure that all ingredients meet their strict purity standards. - SLO-FOOD PROCESSING: MegaFood® mills, purees, and optimizes nutrient content. They then dehydrate the ingredients with the utmost care using their unique Slo-food Process. They believe in making the best products for your health. - REAL FOOD + PURE = BEST FOR YOU: Real is pure, honest, no cutting corners or cutting budgets. You can take their word on it, but they have also gotten it certified and verified, just to prove it! MegaFood is committed to real because they like the way real makes YOU feel! They also like the way it makes them feel! They work with real organic farmers and real local natural retailers. They like being a small, honest, rooted-in-real New Hampshire company. They like the feel of being real, using real, and making real. Many people don't think about what is going into their supplements. But that is all MegaFood thinks about!
